sub_title: Exams invigilator British School Of the Netherlands
summary:
Experienced professional with a demonstrated history of working in the individual and family services industry. Skilled in Communication, Organizational Commitment, Responsiveness, Management, and Team Organisation. Results oriented, always in search of new challenges. Customer satisfaction a priority in all my fields.
Strong education professional graduated from Università Cattolica of Milan And Nijmegen Universiteit in The Netherlands (master in law and canonic law), with a great and true passion for human rights and education. Social studies at American University of Kuwait and The Hague Academy of law. 
Life is a never ending learning journey, I love to explore cultures, languages and procedures, supporting humans feeling at home.
Parenting and schooling coach.
